title: Ezra, Matt and Sarah Try to Podcast
description:
In this first episode of the new Vox.com podcast the weeds, Ezra Klein, Sarah Kliff, and Matthew Yglesias look at why Hillary Clinton is trying to gut a major part of Obamacare, how Donald Trump's tax plan made Matt sad, and whether American politics is becoming structurally biased towards outsiders like Trump and away from insiders like Bush. It gets real nerdy, real fast.
This episode was sponsored by Audible.com. For a free audio book and a 30 day free trial, head to Audible.com/WEEDS
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
